package.name: NoCCBar
package.shortDescription: Disables CC Grabber Bar on Lock Screen

descriptionlist.description: Hides the Control Center Grabber bar in the top right corner of the Lock Screen on iPhone X style devices for a cleaner look.
This tweak was acquired from this GitHub repo (no licenses on the repo) and reposted here, and I didn't see a tweak like this for iOS 13 so I uploaded it.
The DEB package file was repacked by me to include the depiction URLs in the control file. The package contents and .dylib file is unchanged from GitHub release.

changelog.change: Repacked DEB to include depiction in control file.
